name: embed-page-component
description: Converts a standalone page component to support embedded mode for use in composite tabbed pages. Adds the `embedded` prop, creates a Wrapper pattern that skips Layout when embedded, and conditionally hides the PageHeader.

steps.action: Add `embedded?: boolean` to the component's props
steps.example: export default function MyPage({ embedded }: { embedded?: boolean })

steps.action: Create Wrapper component that conditionally skips Layout
steps.example: const Wrapper = embedded ? ({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) => <>{children}</> : Layout;

steps.action: Replace all <Layout> with <Wrapper> in return statements (including early returns for loading/empty states)
Wrap PageHeader in `{!embedded && (...)}` conditional so host page controls the header
Test: Component renders standalone at its own route AND embedded inside the host composite page

checklist: Early return states (loading, empty) also use <Wrapper>
No duplicate Layout when used inside host page
data-testid attributes still present on key elements
